bug.author: mxkai
bug.description: Hello, I try to run your code, but there is a problem: File "../ext/voxelmorph/src/losses.py", line 17, in binary_dice vol_axes = 1 + np.range(ndims) AttributeError: module 'numpy' has no attribute 'range' Can you tell me which version of numpy is used for this project，thanks

comments.comment: This actually seems to be a bug in our part. My apologies I'm not sure when it was introduced. can you change vol_axes = 1 + np.range(ndims) to vol_axes = list(range(1, ndims+1)) ?
Thanks for your suggestion，I will try it
